mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ontrack_project(CREATOR, project_type, project_name, project_url, project_dueDate, project_status, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{creator}, #{projectType}, #{projectName}, #{projectUrl}, #{projectDueDate}, #{projectStatus}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id as projectId, p.project_type, p.project_status, p.project_name, p.creator as creatorId, p.project_dueDate,p.createdAt, p.updatedAt, pm.id as memberId, pm.nickname, pm.position, pm.invitedAt, pm.invitedAs FROM ontrack_project p INNER JOIN project_member pm ON p.id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{id}

SELECT p.id as projectId, p.project_type, p.project_status, p.project_name, p.creator as creatorId, p.project_dueDate,p.createdAt, p.updatedAt, pm.position, pm.invitedAt, pm.invitedAs FROM ontrack_project p INNER JOIN project_member pm ON p.id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{id}

SELECT t.id, t.task_title, t.task_status, t.task_dueDate, t.task_priority, t.authorMid, t.authorName, t.createdAt, t.updatedAt, t.updatedBy, tf.taskFileCnt FROM ontrack_task t LEFT JOIN (SELECT task_id, count(task_id) taskFileCnt FROM task_file GROUP BY task_id) tf ON t.id = tf.task_id WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
